content: *when you download one of my free patterns please consider making a donation to your favorite charity thank you * ❤️❤️ during the 2020 covid-19 pandemic i felt a sudden urge to fill the world with colorful flowers so i created this very simple two-round flower design they re so quick and easy to make you ll have dozens of flowers in no time use them as appliqués or brooches in garlands and wreaths or just spread them all over the world skill level beginner materials scraps of colorful yarn i ve used a cotton fingering weight yarn scheepjes catona and a 2 5 mm hook feel free to experiment with different yarns and hook sizes follow me on instagram for new pattern releases sales and discount codes **@torunjcrochet** ❤️
